counsel_check.description: Helpline Specific configs/lex/en_NZ/intents Counsel Check Intent Survey intent

rejection_statement.content: The next message you get will be from one of our counsellors. In the meantime, if you are interested here's a link to our privacy statement: https://youthline.co.nz/privacy-statements/

value_elicitation_prompt.content: Kia ora and welcome to Youthline! If you are seeking support from our Helpline or counselling services please respond 1 for 'Yes' or 2 for 'No'
